186015251.review:
As a long time fan of the series, I was bound to play this at some point. Finally had the chance to when it was on sale for a pretty great price. 

Absolutely loved the game. As many have already said, it felt like a special South Park episode. The storytelling, characters, meta humor, music, and gameplay was on point. I breezed through most of the content as it is quite simple and easy to do. 

Unfortunately, there were two frustrating occasions that prevented me from loving this game too much. Which would have to be the lack of clear instructions, and having to either google or going on YouTube like thousands of other players: Using the ability “Nagasaki” outside of battle on first attempt, and progressing through a certain situation involving Randy and a clinic. 

Despite my minor critiques, overall i was quite pleased with the game. Easily one of my favorites.

185646940.review:
South Park: La Vara de la Verdad sigue siendo un ejemplo de cómo adaptar una serie a un videojuego. Aunque algunos aspectos pueden sentirse simples comparados con RPGs modernos, su humor, fidelidad y carisma lo hacen una joya que vale la pena redescubrir en 2025.

Además, es un juego que, al igual que su secuela, veo muy improbable que vuelva a salir al mercado o que lo haga de manera íntegra. En la actualidad, con la cultura de la cancelación y una generación más sensible que se ofende por cualquier broma, muchas de las escenas y el humor que define a South Park probablemente serían objeto de censura.

Obsidian Entertainment, un estudio conocido por sus impecables juegos de rol, no falló con esta adaptación. Fue perfecto que pusieran todo su talento en este proyecto, ya que no solo es como ver la serie: es como vivirla. Tú tomas acción en todo momento, y esa conexión directa con el universo de South Park lo hace único.

Otro aspecto destacable es su duración, que considero perfecta para este tipo de experiencia. Es lo suficientemente largo como para disfrutar del humor y las mecánicas, pero no tanto como para volverse repetitivo. Aunque cada compañero tiene un rol diferente, alargar el juego habría expuesto las limitaciones en el diseño de las mecánicas y podría haber sido un punto negativo.

Para muchos de nosotros que crecimos con la serie, uno de los aspectos que extrañamos es el doblaje al español. Aunque el juego mantiene su esencia en inglés, no podemos evitar añorar esas voces tan características que definieron nuestra infancia.

Sin embargo, no todo es perfecto. Uno de los puntos negativos es su incompatibilidad con mandos actuales como el DualSense de PS5. Si no cuentas con un mando como el de Xbox, te tocará jugar con teclado, lo cual puede ser incómodo para muchos jugadores.

185537159.review:
[h2][u]South Park™: The Stick of Truth™ | 100% Review[/u][/h2]

South Park: The Stick of Truth was ground breaking back when it came out a decade ago. At a time where licensed games were still a very common thing, and their quality was almost always abysmal, and then here comes this South Park game that looks exactly like an episode of the show, written and directed by the actual guys behind the show, and to top it off, it was actually fun to play. You couldn't really name a lot of games like that. But this was 10 years ago, where does this game stand in today's day and age?

The most glaring thing about the game is its age. They directly reference the date at multiple points throughout the game, and a lot of cultural references from the time didn't last and really age the game. These don't ruin the game, but they take me out of the experience occasionally. But when they're not putting the date up on a wall or talking about early 2010 celebrities, South Park's signature humour shines through. It's not for everyone, they go for blatant shock humour, and push the line wherever possible, and while honestly it's not my favourite, there's a lot of charming writing and clever dialogue that doesn't have to revolve around toilet humour. All of the call backs to South Park's rogues gallery are a treat, the entire Canada segment is hilarious, and every single location is stuffed to the brim with easter eggs and clever gags that makes every screen feel like a Where's Waldo page. If you haven't watched the show, and don't remember much from the time period, there's still something here for you, but you'll miss out on a large majority of this game's charm.

Now, on the gameplay side, the game is divided into 2 distinct portions, overworld exploration, and combat. We'll tackle combat first. You get to pick between 4 classes, the warrior, with high physical damage, the thief, who specialises in attacking the backline and inflicting status effects, the mage, who is blatantly the best class in the game, with massive AOE damage, and the jew, who is just the mage but a bit weaker. Basic combat is styled like the Mario and Luigi series, with timing button prompts making hits hit harder and your opponents hits weaker. Its really simple, but it keeps combat engaging, and manages to be simple enough to ensure it isn't tedious by the ending. The game never really gets difficult, the ability to stack DOT effects and spam healing items makes it pretty impossible to lose, but the game is short and simple by design. Balance is not the game's strong suit, you can pretty easily settle into the same strategy for every fight, making a lot of options feel pointless, the mana system is made totally pointless with PP regenerating after every fight and being a lot more effective, and combat often ends withing 1 or 2 turns tops. Overall, its fun for the short campaign, but has a lot of flaws, and makes repeat playthroughs a bit tedious.

On the other hand, overworld exploration has a lot more going on. You've got 8 different abilities you can use to traverse the overworld, with a lot of different methods to solve puzzles and complete quests, often having multiple solutions to reward thinking outside of the box. Between damaging the environment, teleporting around, shrinking into small areas, interacting with NPCs, and more, the overworld is incredibly dynamic, with things constantly changing throughout the game, and an almost metroidvania design, with a lot of treasure being awarded for going to early areas of the game with your new abilities. Honestly, I think this is my favourite aspect of the game. Collecting all of the costumes and weapons, and getting every friend in the game is a lot of fun, and makes completing this game 100% pretty fun, as long as you're paying attention in the areas you can't come back to.

Overall, I had fun coming back to the game. It has it's problems, but for the South Park guys' first real foray into game development, I think they did a pretty good job. The game is short and sweet, you can knock it out in just under 8 hours if you just focus the main quest, and the game being pretty cheap, especially during sales, I think its definitely worth checking out if you're a fan of the series. If this is your first time with the series, its not a bad introduction by any means, but you'll miss out on a majority of what the game has to offer, maybe start by binge watching a season or two.

185451556.review:
South Park: The Stick of Truth é um RPG surpreendentemente sólido, que faz um trabalho excepcional em imergir o jogador no universo da série, proporcionando a sensação de realmente estar em um episódio de South Park.

O combate é divertido e acessível, o que o torna um excelente ponto de partida para quem é novo no gênero. A narrativa faz um bom trabalho e o humor ácido mantêm a experiência envolvente do início ao fim.

A duração do jogo é outro ponto positivo: com cerca de 10 horas, o ritmo é bem dosado, sem enrolações ou momentos tediosos. Isso contrasta com muitos jogos modernos que, como é comum na Ubisoft, estendem sua duração artificialmente para prender o jogador em um looping chato.

Combinando uma jogabilidade simples, uma história divertida e fidelidade à série, The Stick of Truth entrega uma experiência muito boa. Nota: 8/10.

185378192.review:
South Park the Stick of Truth is an adventure game with turn-based combat and RPG elements, filled with the trademark humour of the show that you either love or hate.

The story sees you as a new kid with a mysterious past, moving into South Park and getting caught up in an Elves vs Humans game played by the cast of the show. The story is dumb - in the way that all South Park stories are, but it is pretty fun and there are some good jokes along the way.

The gameplay is divided between exploring the town and fighting in turn-based combat. The exploration has some cool secrets, especially for fans of the show. The combat side is rather bland by modern standards, but with the length of the game, there is enough variety to keep things more or less interesting. Gear matters a lot in the game and some of the best gear can be gotten as quest rewards for side-quests.

Overall, if you like the humour of South Park and want to essentially play an extended episode then I'd definetly reccommend this game.

185190650.review:
South Park: The Stick of Truth – это великолепная ролевая игра, которая точно передает атмосферу любимого многими мультсериала. Разработчикам Obsidian Entertainment удалось создать невероятно проработанный мир Южного Парка, наполненный огромным количеством пасхалок и знакомых персонажей.

Сюжет игры затягивает с первых минут. Вы оказываетесь в роли нового ученика Южной начальной школы, который быстро вовлекается в эпическую борьбу между эльфами и людьми за легендарную Палку Истины. Квесты и задания очень разнообразны - от поиска пропавших кошек до сражений с суперзлодеями. Прохождение занимает около 15-20 часов, но за это время вы успеете побывать практически во всех знаковых локациях городка.

Игровой процесс представляет собой смесь классической ролевой игры и приключенческого экшена. Сражения проходят в пошаговом режиме, где важно правильно использовать способности персонажа и своевременно блокировать атаки противников. Кроме того, вы можете постоянно экипировать новые виды оружия и брони, улучшая характеристики своего героя.

В целом, South Park: The Stick of Truth - это очень качественная и смешная игра, которая порадует как фанатов мультсериала, так и любителей ролевых игр. Авторам удалось создать увлекательный сюжет, великолепный визуальный стиль и отличный геймплей. Это, пожалуй, лучшая экранизация South Park на данный момент.
10 принцесс Кенни из 10

South Park: The Stick of Truth 🚸🏞️🍁🧢🏫📚

Das Spiel fühlt sich an wie eine spielbare Folge der Serie – visuell authentisch, voller typischem South Park-Humor und mit jeder Menge Fanservice.

Allerdings richtet sich das Spiel meiner Meinung nach fast ausschließlich nur an die Fans. Spielerisch ist es sehr simpel gehalten und die Story bleibt überwiegend flach. Mit der Zeit zog sich das Spiel in die Länge und verlor für mich an Reiz. Zusätzlich sind die automatischen Speicherpunkte schlecht platziert, was den Spielfluss manchmal stört.

Fazit: Für eingefleischte Fans der Serie ein gelungener Ausflug nach South Park. Wer jedoch mehr als Fanservice und flachen Humor erwartet, könnte enttäuscht werden.

Bewertung: ⭐⭐⭐ (3/5)

Это как смотреть одноименный мульт, но очень концентрированный на разнообразные события, только вы сами в нем участвуете.

Мир воссоздан с огромной любовью. Ходить и исследовать его кайфово. Чувствуется ламповость и уют. Почти в каждый дом можно зайти, поискать лут и секретики. Так я исследовал город ЦЕЛЫХ 3 раза! Я не знал, что будут открываться способности, которые позволят пройти в какие-то недоступные места, да и недоступными местами я бы это не назвал) Кто бы мог подумать, что "некая штука" на воде переместит под воду или норка для Джерри - это проход в комнату с лутом. В начале ты этого естественно не понимаешь.

Очень много всяких разных пушек, шмоток и аксессуаров, которые меняют внешку главного героя. Сначала я одевался стильно и со вкусом, отыгрывая перса в Днд, но под конец и я и игра свели все в дикий трешняк. Я уже бегал с лицом Дэвида Хассельхоффа, в платье феи с крылашками, с крабьими лапами и катаной, а в игре уже был дикий абсурд в стиле мульта (немного пердеж утомил уже в конце).

Всю игру старался бегать с Баттерсом. Прикольный напарник. А его ульта в стиле Профессора Хаоса очень эффектная и местами имбовая. В глаз сюрикеном ему тут не попали) Другие напарники тоже хороши и у каждого свои плюшки.

Рекомендовать всем не буду, так как люди, которые не смотрели Южный Парк вряд ли смогут оценить все те приколы, отсылки и треш, которых тут завались. Фанатам же обязательно к прохождению. Хотя бы чисто по сюжетке пробежаться.

По достижениям слишком много заморочек и много пропускаемых трофеев. Пришлось пройти второй раз до момента с выбором за какую сторону я буду воевать, так как пропустил несколько трофеев, которые не выбить в эндгейме.

Еще понял одну вещь. Игра с таким визуалом будет актуальной всегда. Ей не нужны ремастеры и ремейки. Выглядит красиво и оригинально.

[h1]🛡️ South Park™: The Stick of Truth™ : Une Quête Épique dans l’Absurde 🗡️[/h1]
[p]Temps de jeu : Environ 10 à 12 heures pour finir l’histoire principale, et jusqu’à 15 heures pour explorer chaque recoin de cette petite ville déjantée.[/p]
[p]Genre : RPG hilarant et satirique, dans l’univers inimitable de South Park.[/p]

[h2]Les points positifs :[/h2]
[p]🤣 Une fidélité parfaite à la série : L’humour noir, les situations absurdes, et les personnages emblématiques font de ce jeu un épisode interactif de South Park. Chaque dialogue est une perle.[/p]
[p]⚔️ Un RPG accessible et fun : Le système de combat au tour par tour est simple à comprendre, avec une touche de stratégie et des attaques spéciales qui vous feront éclater de rire (le "Coup de pet magique", quelqu’un ?).[/p]
[p]🏙️ Une carte à explorer : La ville de South Park est reproduite dans les moindres détails, de la maison de Cartman au bar préféré des ivrognes. Chaque lieu regorge de références et de secrets pour les fans.[/p]
[p]🧙‍♂️ Un casting inoubliable : Que ce soit le "Grand Sorcier Cartman", le "Juif" Kyle, ou Butters le Paladin naïf, chaque personnage joue son rôle à la perfection dans cette parodie épique de fantasy.[/p]

[h2]Les points négatifs :[/h2]
[p]⏳ Une durée de vie limitée : Si vous vous concentrez uniquement sur l’histoire principale, le jeu se termine rapidement, laissant un petit goût de "déjà fini ?".[/p]
[p]💩 Un humour qui ne plaira pas à tous : Fidèle à South Park, le jeu est vulgaire, irrévérencieux, et parfois provocant. Ceux qui ne sont pas fans de la série pourraient être rebutés.[/p]

[h2]Le prix :[/h2]
[p]Avec un prix avoisinant les 30 €, et souvent en promotion, South Park™: The Stick of Truth™ est une excellente affaire pour les fans de la série et de RPG légers.[/p]

[h2]🏆 Le platine :[/h2]
[p]Obtenir le platine est un défi modéré. Il faudra rejouer certaines sections pour obtenir tous les trophées (notamment ceux liés aux choix de classes ou de factions). Préparez-vous à revisiter South Park avec un guide pour chasser les collectibles et savourer chaque boutade. Comptez environ 20 heures pour tout déverrouiller ![/p]

[p]En résumé, South Park™: The Stick of Truth™ est un RPG hilarant qui capture l’essence même de la série. Entre les situations absurdes, les dialogues cinglants, et les références pop culture à gogo, ce jeu est une expérience inoubliable pour les fans. Alors, prenez votre épée (ou votre baguette de pet), enfilez votre costume de héros, et préparez-vous à sauver le Bâton de Vérité avec style… ou ridicule. 🛡️🎭[/p]

184947197.review:
South Park: The Stick of Truth — это игра, которая превзошла все мои ожидания. Как поклонник мультсериала, я давно ждал возможность самому окунуться в абсурдный мир Саут-Парка, и эта RPG идеально справилась с задачей.

Что понравилось:
Юмор и атмосфера: Игра — это практически интерактивная серия South Park. Каждый диалог, каждая шутка и каждая деталь пропитаны фирменным юмором Трея Паркера и Мэтта Стоуна. Отсылки к культовым моментам сериала делают игру настоящим подарком для фанатов.
Геймплей: Пошаговые бои с интерактивными элементами оказались неожиданно увлекательными. А система прокачки персонажа, выбор класса и улучшение экипировки добавляют глубины.
Дизайн и графика: Визуально игра выглядит так, будто это действительно эпизод сериала. Это придаёт уникальный шарм и заставляет забыть, что это вовсе не телевизор, а игровой экран.
Свобода исследования: Исследовать Саут-Парк было настоящим удовольствием. Каждая локация — это кладезь секретов, знакомых персонажей и неожиданных ситуаций.

Что не понравилось:
Длительность: Сюжетная линия достаточно короткая — игру можно пройти за 10-12 часов. Хотелось бы провести больше времени в этом мире.
Простота: Для опытных игроков сложность может показаться недостаточной, особенно в боевой системе.

Общие впечатления:
The Stick of Truth — это не просто игра, это настоящая дань уважения South Park и его поклонникам. В ней всё сделано с любовью и вниманием к деталям. Я смеялся до слёз, наслаждался каждой минутой и остался под большим впечатлением от того, как органично Obsidian смогли воплотить дух мультсериала в видеоигре.

Итог: South Park: The Stick of Truth — это обязательный опыт для любого фаната сериала и тех, кто ищет RPG с уникальной атмосферой. Смело рекомендую!

Оценка: 9/10.

Начнём с плюсов
1: максимальная приблежонность к оригинальному сериалу: Игра ощущается как длинная серия Южного парка, где протагонистом является ваш главный герой. Это было невероятно особенно для тех лет когда она только вышла. Прогуляться по знакомым улочкам Южного парка весьма радует, ибо разработчики подошли к дизайну мира со всей душой, да и тем более всё сделано просто на кончиках пальцев. Юмор и абсурдность также приближена к оригиналу, однако какой-нибудь иронии или мета юмора там не ищите, ибо в конце концов игра сделана как лёгкое приключение под пивко, и в принципе шутки там более менее соответствующие

2: незамысловатая боёвка: игра представляет собой пошаговую ролёвку, и в ней есть всё присущее этому жанру - доп квесты, различное оружие и одежда, а также довольно много разнообразных скиллов у гг. Боёвка представляет собой затыкивание по скиллам и прохождение квик тайм ивентов на большестве из них. По началу прохождения боёвка не надоедает, и в принципе для ролёвок весьма свежо как по мне. Также в вашем распоряжении есть напарники, в виде основных героев ЮП, однако они открываются по ходу прохождения сюжетки, и на последней трети игры, вы откройте их всех, и в этом также есть минусы, но о них как раз и пойдёт речь.


Минусы:
1: зависимость одежды и оружия от уровней: У каждого оружия и одежды в игре есть свой уровень, и чтобы комфортно чувствовать себя в среде игры, нужно постоянно менять как одежду, так и оружие, так что если вы хотите ходить в какой-то конкретной одежде которая вам понравилась, увы игра не позволит это сделать, ибо если вы оденете низкоуровневый шмот и оружие, то вас будут пинать как девчонку, и вы будите наносить столько урона, что там его как кот наплакал, и вам придётся взять одежду и оружие более высокого уровня, чтобы комфортно играть.

2: Дизбаланс напарников: Как я уже ранее говорил, в игре есть напарники, и в последней трети игры они доступны все, и среди них Кайл И Картман, и скажу сразу, лично мне стало скучновато, ибо с самого первого хода вашей команды, имея при себе Картмана в качестве напарника, враги тупо не успевают сделать ход и умирают, так что совет, не повторяйте моих ошибок, и почаще меняйте напарников, чтобы вам не было так скучно как мне.


3: Сложность получения всех ачивок: Это не то чтобы минус, однако их получать довольно интересно, однако бывает душновато собирать эти предметы, в частности собирать  чинпокомонов. В некоторых местах прохождение на 100% можно запороть, ибо некоторые вещи можно легко пропустить, и получение нескольких достижений будет завалено. Также для получения всех достижений нужно собирать друзей в соц сети, а их если что 120 штук, так что желательно проходить сайд квесты и обчухать практически всю карту. Опять-же некоторых друзей легко пропустить, поэтому я прикреплю здесь ссылку на видео гайд на получение всех достижений:
https://youtu.be/G3HkL7OvYUw?si=lrNg3kEOGZQTYq3X

Подвидём итоги: Южный Парк Палка Истины для своего времени весьма недурный продукт, и даже сейчас играется весьма неплохо, особенно для фанатов сериала, которые хотели увидеть видеоигровое воплощение сериала. Так что от всего сердца, если вы хотите провести приятный вечерок, да и в принципе любите Южный Парк, то порекомендую для начала эту игру. Ставлю 10 пердежей на яица за 10

Despues de casi 23 horas de partidas y el juego totalmente platinado vengo a dar mi opinion acerca de este fantastico juego:

Si te gusta South Park, este es el juego que no podes dejar pasar. Es como vivir un episodio de la serie, pero con la libertad de poder explorar el pueblo y avanzar totalmente a tu ritmo.

La historia arranca con tu llegada como el tipico chico nuevo del barrio, pero en poco tiempo estas entre medio de una guerra entre humanos y elfos por el control del "Palo de la verdad" (Que es en lo que basa el juego basicamente) Lo que empieza como un juego de rol entre nenes, se convierte rápidamente en algo completamente ilogico, con alienígenas, nazis zombis y momentos tan comicos como los mismo que salen en la serie.

Lo mejor de este juego para mi son los personajes: Cartman, Butters, Kyle, Stan y para mi el mejor, el Sr Esclavo, con diálogos divertidisimos y escenas que parecen sacadas directamente de la serie. Además, el humor del juego es buenisimo (Humor negro, judios, abortos, etc)

Si sos un fan de la serie, este juego te va a encantar, haceme caso.

Recomiendo comprar el juego en oferta.

[h1] Обзор [/h1]
Давно не писал обзор на какую нибудь шнягу, ну вот время наступило.
South Park: The Stick of Truth - супер игра по мотиву мультика Южный Парк, с элементами экшена + приключение + черный юмор про нацизм, пердеж, яйца, говно и т.д.
Сразу говорю, игра подойдет не всем (имею в виду тех, у кого нету абсолютного юмора либо не переносит черный юмор), а остальным с хорошим чувством юмора (как я) игра зайдет на все 100.
Игру проходил в сумме 3 раза, 2 из которых было в далеком прошлом на старом ноуте + на пиратке, а 3 раз решил уже пройти в настоящем времени увидев её по скидке.
Игра которая вышла в 2014 году на сегодняшнее время выглядит столь неплохой и играбельной, можно спокойно пройти за 10+ часов (если конечно не будете тупить в некоторых моментах).
В целом что я могу сказать, если вы веселый человек, а уж тем более фанат Южного Парка и черного юмора, советую пройти если вы ещё этого не сделали, прошел в третий раз с удовольствием и не пожалел что потратил свои кровные заработанные деньги на игру, советую её брать по скидке так как на полную стоимость она все же не тянет
Особо по сюжету ничего писать не буду, мне лень и вы сами можете прочитать в описание игры (если вы конечно умеете читать)
Могу сказать что сюжет прикольный, ставлю 10 пердежей на яйца из 10

184816645.review:
Wow, I was not expecting this game to be as good as it is! Not only does it look exactly like the TV show, but the gameplay also brings back fond memories of a PS1 classic called Legend of Dragoon. The addition system in this game is a brilliant feature—timing your attacks and dodges perfectly to deal extra damage. It's something I haven’t seen in any other turn-based RPGs, and I was thrilled to see it here!

This game really surprised me, especially because I never thought that this game (no offense!) would be the one to mimic such an iconic system from Legend of Dragoon, which is my all-time favorite JRPG.

If you're a fan of the show or love classic turn-based RPGs, I highly recommend checking this out!

184760338.review:
Con solo decir que tratan el mismo humor de la serie lo dice todo, me encanta este juego me lo pase en 11 horas y fueron las mejores 11 horas en un plazo de dos días que no olvidare.

Me encanta el combate es muy entretenido y los ataques son de lo mejor ya que cada uno tiene su mecanica como destrozar el teclado pulsando la tecla S, junto a las referencia de la serie que pueden contener. Que ademas nunca entendí los ataques de los pedos.

Me gusta mucho como esta hecha la ciudad y los escenarios que tiene no se como describirlo pero simplemente me gusta la estética que se trabaja como cuando ya estas por terminar el juego.

En cuanto a las misiones secundarias fue un poco 50/50 ya que misiones como el Hombre-Oso-Cerdo tiene un poco de gracia el del bardo en la granja fue muy meh por así decirlo pero son misiones secundarias así que me da un poco igual.

En resumen el juego esta bueno lo agarre en oferta con lo que me salio baratisimo y me encanto desde que vi los videos de fernanfloo en su momento con lo que siempre quise jugarlo hasta que terminando el 2024 pude cumplir ese capricho que tanto queria.

184754538.review: Fırtınalı bir akşamdı. Yağmurdan kaçmak için bulduğum ilk metro durağına girmiştim. Daha sonra hazır girmişken otomatlardan bir paket bisküvi alayım dedim. otomatın başına gittiğimde önümde bir kız vardı. Kumral saçlı, beyaz bereli, mor kazaklı, siyah kot pantolonlu ve  otomatın köşesine dayadığı siyah şemsiyesiyle beni benden almıştı. O an aklımdan sadece 1 şey geçti "zombi çok yaratık bol, elmas kılıcım var". Evet evet sadece bu. Kız, otomattan almak  istediği şeyi alana kadar aklımdan bu geçti. daha sonra kendisi alacağı şeyi alıp 3-4 adım uzaklaştı ancak bir sorun vardı. otomata gidene kadar üzerimde nakit var mı yok mu bakmamıştım. Olmadığını otomatta fark etmem daha da zoruma gitmişti. Zar zor belki 3-5 bir şey  çıkar diye deri ceketimi karıştırırken omzuma bir el dokundu. O kız. Arkasından baktığımda bana bıraktığı etki yetmiyormuş gibi, yeşil gözlerini görünce o etki ikiye katlanmıştı. Bana üzerinde ona yük olan bozuk paralar olduğunu ve bana verebileceğini söyledi. O an dilim tutulduğu için sadece gözlerine baktım. Bakarken bana eli ile uzattığı bozuk paraları fark etmemişim bile. "Hadi almayacak mısın" demesi üzerine panik bir şekilde terlemiş ellerimle kızın elini avuçladım. Sonra verdiği para ile en ucuz bisküviden 2 adet aldım ve hemen yanına gittim. Nereye gittiğini sordum. Bana metroya binip diğer ilçedeki evine gideceğini söyledi. Ben de gelmek istedim ama metroya binmek için ne kartımda para ne de kartı doldurmak için nakit para vardı. O an yıkıldım. Ağzımdan sadece "hemen mi?" sorusu çıkabildi. O da bana bineceği metroyu birine sorduğunu ve sorduğu kişinin daha 10 dakikası var dediği için otomattan bir şeyler almaya geldiğini söyledi. Muhtemelen 3-4 dakikası kalmıştı ve bunu o da fark etmişti. Adımlarını hızlandırıp turnikeye doğru giderken son bir kez kolundan tutup "seni daha sonra nasıl bulabilirim?" dedim. Onun da son sözü şu oldu: "Bloklar silahlar Minecraft'ta bitmez savaşlar"

184679515.review:
The Stick of Truth is, without a doubt, one of the most charming and hilarious RPGs you’ll play. It is one of the few games based on a tv show that is worth playing and perfectly hits it's mark. Nearly eleven years since its release, it still offers a surprisingly enjoyable experience that stands the test of time.

If you like what Matt and Trey created with the tv show and enjoy RPGs then don't hesitate to purchase. The battle mechanics get a bit boring and monotonous but there are enough silly antics and Easter eggs hidden throughout the game to more than make up for that. It is worth trying out a few different classes on replays as well.

Now, if only they would get the garbage DRM removed from their follow up, Fractured But Whole, it may be worth continuing through the series after many replays of Stick of Truth...

184679464.review: Surprisingly solid game that makes you feel like you're just walking through an actual episode of South Park. The gameplay loop is pretty simplistic but solid and still leaves you some space to experiment and explore the game world a bit.

184668546.review:
Aunque The Stick of Truth captura con precisión el estilo y humor de la serie, no está exento de críticas.

Jugabilidad simplista: El sistema de combate por turnos carece de profundidad, volviéndose repetitivo con el tiempo y ofreciendo un desafío limitado.

Rejugabilidad limitada: Una vez terminado, ofrece poco incentivo para volver a jugar, salvo experimentar nuevamente los momentos cómicos.

Falta de innovación: Como RPG, no aporta mecánicas novedosas ni expande significativamente las posibilidades del género.
En resumen, es un título entretenido para los fans de la serie, pero sus limitaciones pueden frustrar a quienes busquen una experiencia de juego más robusta o compleja.

Es un juego muy bueno, realmente se entiende el por que fue nominado a juego del año cuando salio, en su momento lo jugué, pero ahora en 2024 me dieron ganas de rejugarlo y aproveche las rebajas de navidad, sin duda te vas a pasar un buen rato jugandolo, como si estuvieras en un capitulo interactivo de South Park

***RECOMENDACION PARA PLATINARLO***
Para conseguir todos los logros te recomiendo seguir una guía, teniendo en cuenta que para evitar spoilers sea unicamente los objetos perdibles, ya que muy facilmente puedes perderte de muchos durante la campaña, lo que al momento de querer juntar todo te puede faltar 1 solo objeto por el que tengas que volver a iniciar de 0 o volver a puntos de guardado muy antiguos, haciendo que te puedas frustrar o te de la sensacion de ya no querer continuar.

Para el farmeo de dinero para conseguir armas y ropa en endgame te recomiendo de 2, en la parte de la tienda de jimbo va a haber varas maquinas de parking en la calle, al romper todo eso te da dinero, sumado a los modificadores de recibir mas dinero, rompes los 4 y corres a la tienda de jimbo, entras, sales y repites el proceso hasta el cansancio, la otra manera practica que encontre fue en canada, que en mi clase en particular que fue Judío, descubri que con 3 mejoras de la ultima habilidad que desbloqueas, todos esos enemigos mueren usando un patron de "1 vez abajo (s) y 3 arriba (w)" por lo que al matarlos y lootear tendras dinero canadiense y muchos objetos basura y consumibles que puedes vender para tener una muy buena cantidad de dinero.

184561113.review:
South Park: The Stick of Truth — это просто взрыв мозга в самом лучшем смысле! Я не фанат сериала, то иногда его смотрю, и эта игра заставила меня взглянуть на «Южный парк» по-новому.

Что мне понравилось:
1. **Весёлый и безумный геймплей**: Игра наполнена жёсткими шутками и ироничным сюжетом, который держит в напряжении до самого конца.
2. **Неожиданные персонажи и события**: В игре полно сюрпризов, связанных с самыми неожиданными персонажами. Это добавляет динамики и интереса.
3. **Графика и стиль**: Стилизованная графика просто великолепна. Мир игры проработан до мельчайших деталей, и даже новички, не смотревшие сериал, могут легко влиться в атмосферу.
4. **Ролевая система**: Хотя она и урезана, но комбинирование способностей и перков, а также разные классы делают игру увлекательной.
5. **Множество контента**: В игре тьма контента — можно потратить часы на исследование локаций и поиск секретов. Я прошел игру примерно за 29 часов. 
6. **Отсутствие толерантности**: Удивительно, но в игре нет надоевшей толерантности, что для современных игр большая редкость.

Единственное, что не понравилось:
1. **Вид сбоку**: Иногда можно заблудиться в трёх соснах.

В целом, игра оставила массу положительных впечатлений. Если вы никогда не играли, советую сначала посмотреть значимые серии «Южного парка», чтобы насладиться всеми отсылками и шутками.

South Park: The Stick of Truth — это весёлая, безумная и стильная игра, которая обязательна к ознакомлению всем любителям качественных RPG и фанатам сериала.

184553483.review:
This game is very short. My first playthrough (completely blind) took me just over 8 hours and I completed 19/20 side quests and collected most of the collectables. My second playthrough for all the achievements took me 7 hours. I played on Hardcore and whilst the combat is really fun and has a surprising level of strategy, it wasn't difficult on the hardest mode and the achievement to not let anyone die was a breeze. 

The game is very funny though (especially if you understand the references to the source material) and whilst it is short, it's a very good take on the classic D&D adventure from the position of 9 year old's playing a role playing game. To avoid spoiling anything, the game definitely turns in an unexpected direction but overall the story is great if not short.

I don't know if I can recommend paying £25 for it though as my fresh, average playthrough was over very quickly. Definitly recommend if you can get it cheap

184445157.review:
South Park™: The Stick of Truth™ – Ein abgedrehtes Meisterwerk!  

Dieses Spiel ist nichts für schwache Nerven – oder für Leute mit einem empfindlichen Humor. Von Furzmagie über Nazi-Zombies bis hin zu den völlig absurden Beschwörungen wird hier alles aufgefahren, was du von South Park erwarten kannst … und noch viel mehr.  

Was dich erwartet  
Du bist der Neue in South Park und wirst sofort in einen epischen Krieg um den legendären "Stock der Wahrheit" verwickelt. Klingt harmlos? Denkste! Schon bald wirst du es mit Nazi-Zombies, einer Hitler-Seuche und jeder Menge abgedrehter Charaktere zu tun bekommen.  

Highlights des Wahnsinns  

- Die Hitler-Seuche  
  Nazi-Zombies mit Hitler-Gesichtern, die ihre Parolen schreien – das ist so verstörend und gleichzeitig so absurd witzig, dass du nicht weißt, ob du lachen oder dir an den Kopf fassen sollst. Besonders in den Kämpfen sorgen sie für den puren Wahnsinn.  

- Beschwörungen – Einfach legendär!  
  Und dann sind da noch die Beschwörungen. Stell dir vor, du kannst Jesus mit einer Maschinenpistole herbeirufen, um deine Feinde wegzuballern. Oder du rufst Mr. Sklave, der ... nun ja ... deine Gegner auf seine ganz spezielle Art verschlingt. Die Beschwörungen sind so verrückt und völlig überzogen, dass sie zu den absoluten Höhepunkten des Spiels gehören.  

- Humor ohne Grenzen  
  Furz-Attacken, sprechende Tiere, kranke Nebenquests – alles wird gnadenlos durch den Kakao gezogen. Die Kombination aus schwarzem Humor und gnadenloser Satire ist einfach einzigartig.  

- South Park zum Anfassen  
  Du spielst eine Folge der Serie, so fühlt es sich an. Jeder Ort, jede Figur – alles ist perfekt eingefangen, und die Dialoge sind zum Schreien komisch.  

Warum du es lieben wirst  
Das Spiel hat einfach alles, was ein South Park-Fan sich wünschen kann: unvergessliche Momente, schrägen Humor und völlig absurde Wendungen. Die Hitler-Seuche und die irren Beschwörungen sind nur die Spitze des Eisbergs in diesem Chaos voller Lacher und WTF-Momente.  

Bewertung: 10/10 – Ein Muss für alle, die es so richtig krank und witzig mögen!

184443172.review:
South Park: The Stick of Truth - A Hilarious, Unforgettable Adventure

Having just completed South Park: The Stick of Truth, I can confidently say it is one of the most fun, absurd, and engaging games I’ve ever played. As a fan of the show, I was already primed to enjoy the humor and wit that South Park is known for, but the game delivered an experience that went far beyond just being a fan service. The way the game perfectly mirrors the style, tone, and outrageous humor of the series makes it feel like you're actually living an episode of the show.

Story and Humor:
The plot revolves around a new kid (played by you) who gets thrust into the ongoing war between the humans and elves over the legendary Stick of Truth. The story is every bit as bizarre and irreverent as you would expect from South Park. It’s filled with hilarious references to the show’s most iconic moments, and there are plenty of unexpected, outrageous twists that kept me laughing from start to finish. The dialogue is sharp, witty, and as adult as it gets, with countless pop culture references sprinkled in.

Gameplay:
The turn-based combat is straightforward but satisfying. It’s not overly complex, but the variety of abilities and strategic elements keep things interesting. There’s a nice balance of exploration, puzzle-solving, and combat. The game does a great job of introducing new mechanics as it progresses, ensuring that there’s always something new to keep you hooked. The way the game integrates humor into the gameplay itself—whether through ridiculous mini-games, outrageous enemies, or off-the-wall quests—keeps it feeling fresh and never dull.

Character Progression & Achievements:
The character progression is simple but effective, allowing you to customize your character’s abilities and weapons as you advance. I completed all the achievements, and while some were a bit challenging, they were a great incentive to dive deeper into the game world. Collectibles and hidden quests provided enough motivation to fully explore every corner of the map, and I was never bored.

Visuals and Sound:
Visually, The Stick of Truth perfectly replicates the distinctive South Park animation style. The 2D look is charming, and the way it transitions into 3D during combat adds a dynamic element to the experience. The voice acting, of course, is phenomenal, with the entire South Park cast reprising their roles. The music and sound design also stand out, with catchy tunes and spot-on sound effects.

Final Thoughts:
Overall, South Park: The Stick of Truth is a must-play for any fan of the show. It combines great humor, a fun story, solid gameplay, and plenty of Easter eggs that will make you feel like you're in an interactive South Park episode. I thoroughly enjoyed every moment of it, and completing all the achievements just added to the satisfaction. If you’ve ever wondered what it’s like to live in the chaotic world of South Park, this game is your ticket.

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

184440218.review:
This is a solid RPG (in the style of JRPG's) centered around the town of South Park and its kids.
If you do not know South Park be aware that it is a show with crass satire adjacent humor. And I mean really crass.

HOWEVER, I have not watched SouthPark itself since the early 2000's and I'd argue that the concepts and story is stand alone enough that not having watched the show shouldn't really impact your... uh... fun, playing this game.

On the crass humor: I am ususally not necessarily a fan of this kind of humor.
My fascination with stories like this or High on Life (which was developed by one of the writers around) or Rick and Morty is because, when they do it well, the writers of these create partialy unhinged worlds or universes that are often utterly absurd while somehow still making sense.

Same counts for this story that uses all the tropes of modern US Small Town life and does the worst/most absurd with it.

So much to the story.

On the gameplay: This is a competent RPG with round based combat.

It has three armor slots, for head, body and gloves.

Two weapon slots, one for Meele and one for ranged weapons.

Most of those armors and weapons come with attributes that boost stats or have in combat effect, like fire and gross.

Most of the armors and weapons also have slots that can be filled with patches which boost stats or give additional effects like healing, fire, temporary boosts to attack or defense etc.

These patches can be freely removed and reapplied, for example to better equipment. So none of the patches will be lost upon applying them to equipment. This is very player friendly and lets them experiment with different effects.

You have additionally Fart powers (Magic) that use Mana as well as Special Abilities that use PP.

There are perks which you unlock via perk points. 

You unlock more and upgrade all of this as you progress trough the story and "gain friends" on your social Media Profile. Basically the game uses your social media "friendships" to show your level.

As you complete Quests you encounter more individuals that add themselves as friends and that is how you gain tokens and points to upgrade the various systems.

You can always have one of the main kid Characters from the show in your party. You unlock them via the story and can freely change between them outside and during battle, except during some specific Story beats. 


To my pleasant surprise combat itself feels satisfying and compelling, despite the games overall visual style.

There is also some satisfying, light exploration. Often when you get a new power or party member you can use either of those to open up more areas and find secrets which always give the player more loot.

Last but not least I finished all Quests minus one minor Side quest in about 16 hours. 

This is an important point for me. This game does not waste your time or artificially prolong playtime with filler and side activities that are repeated ad nauseam. 

The pacing is excellent. 

I never had the feeling that any aspect or scenario or quests of gameplay and story overstayed their welcome, except for one minor scene where that was on purpose. I never had the feeling that the game was filling air or wasting my time.

Within the reasonable playtime of 16 hours, the game gave me experience that felt satisfying and most of all complete.

[h2]An Interactive South Park Adventure[/h2]
[b]South Park™: The Stick of Truth[/b] is a hilarious RPG that perfectly captures the essence of the cult series. From absurd stories to its signature crude humor, the game feels like an interactive episode that will delight fans and RPG newcomers alike.

[h3]Strengths:[/h3]
[b]✔️ Authentic South Park experience: [/b]
The game feels like an interactive episode, staying true to the humor and style of the series.

[b]✔️ Simple but entertaining RPG gameplay:[/b] 
The mechanics are easy to grasp and provide a fun experience.

[b]✔️ Easter eggs and references:[/b]
Perfect for fans of the series who enjoy uncovering hidden nods and jokes.

[b]✔️ Original voice actors: [/b]
The characters are voiced by the original cast, adding to the authenticity.

[b]✔️ Unforgettable moments:[/b] 
The story and absurd situations provide countless laughs.

[h3]Weaknesses:[/h3]
[b]❌ Limited replayability: [/b]
Once the story is completed, there's little incentive to play it again.

[b]❌ Simplistic RPG mechanics:[/b] 
Genre veterans might find the mechanics lack depth.

[b]❌ Humor:[/b] 
Some jokes may not appeal to everyone, especially those unfamiliar with the series.

[h3](Not) Recommended for:[/h3]
[b]✔️ Recommended for:[/b]
• Fans of South Park who love the show's quirky world and crude humor.
• Players who prefer lighthearted and entertaining RPGs.
• Anyone who enjoys absurd and unique storytelling.

[b]❌ Not Recommended for:[/b]
• Players looking for complex and in-depth RPG mechanics.
• Those who aren't fans of South Park's provocative humor.

[h3]Final Verdict:[/h3]
[b]South Park™: The Stick of Truth[/b] is a lovingly crafted game that perfectly captures the essence of the series. The story is absurd, hilarious, and packed with iconic moments that fans will cherish. The RPG mechanics are solid but not particularly complex, making the game accessible but somewhat limited.

[b]Note:[/b] My playtime does not reflect the actual duration of the game. For a realistic estimate, I recommend checking [url=https://howlongtobeat.com]HowLongToBeat[/url].

Having to buy potions (speed, revive, health) every chance you get because sometimes you will have 4 or 5 battles in a row without a break to resupply really wears on you. EVERY battle requires a boatload of potions. The 'magic' (farting) is funny in a South Park way but just unduly difficult to do in game (see two sticks/console issues.)

If you love South Park and Console games - you'll probably love this. But otherwise I don't suggest it.

Göründüğünden çok daha güzel bir oyun. Muazzam bir yapım.
Sıra tabanlı strateji, rol yapma ve açık dünya ögelerini iç içe geçirmeyi başarmış bu oyun aynı zamanda bildiğimiz South Park'ın kara mizahını da aynı şekilde yansıtmayı başarıyor.
Temanın izin vermesinden dolayı çok çeşitli karakterleri yaratabilmenize imkan sağladığı gibi kendine özel sürükleyici, komedi ve stratejik oynanışıyla ufuk açıyor.
Elbette yetişkinlere hitap eden bir mizah anlayışı olmasıyla beraber bolca argo, küfür ve bu tarz şeyleri bolca barındırıyor. Dolayısıyla böyle şeylerden rahatsız olabilecek kimselerin dikkatli davranmasını öneririm.

Açık dünya haritamızda hikayeyi ilerletirken, birçok çeşitli düşmanla karşı karşıya geliyorsunuz ve çeşitli savaş malzemelerini elde edebiliyorsunuz. Mahalleye yeni taşınan bir çocuk olarak başladığımız Stick of Truth, kralımız Cartman tarafından yönetilen bir tarikatvari oluşumun bir nevi kutsal, sihirli eşyasını oluşturuyor ve amacımız onu düşmanlardan korumak.

Çizgidizinin oyuna adaptasyonu çok iyi yapılmış. Görselleri ve grafikleri buradan aşina olduğumuz yapıda işlenmiş. Haritası büyük ve ana hikayede kahramanların bir şeyler yaşadığı birçok mekan oyuna eklenmiş ve her birine gidebiliyoruz. Karakter özelleştirmeleri, silahlar, korumalar, büyüler; hepsi Soulth Park'ın mizahi anlayışı çerçevesinde çok iyi uyumlandırılmış biçimde karşımıza çıkıyor. Uzun bir oyun ve neredeyse oynamaya kıyamadığım oyunlardan biri halinde. 
Öneriyorum.

184318133.review:
South Park : Le Bâton de la Vérité est une expérience de jeu hilarante et décalée qui plonge les joueurs dans l'univers fou et irrévérencieux de la série télévisée. Ce jeu combine un gameplay de RPG avec l'humour provocateur et absurde typique de South Park, offrant une aventure où les joueurs interagissent avec les personnages emblématiques de la série tout en résolvant des quêtes délirantes. Si vous êtes un fan de la série ou de l'humour noir, ce jeu mérite votre attention.

C'est un excellent jeu pour ceux qui recherchent une expérience ludique légère mais pleine de surprises, avec un style graphique qui imite parfaitement l'animation de la série. Les fans de RPG apprécieront le système de combat simple mais stratégique, tandis que les amateurs de South Park se régaleront des références et des gags qui ponctuent l'aventure. Bien qu'il puisse sembler un peu répétitif par moments, l'humour et l'univers unique du jeu compensent largement ces petits défauts. Si vous aimez les jeux qui ne se prennent pas au sérieux et qui osent tout, je le recommande vivement, notamment pour une expérience solo ou en compagnie d'amis fans de la série !

184282758.review:
Se você é fã de South Park ou só curte um RPG cheio de humor ácido, piadas polêmicas e momentos absurdamente hilários, então The Stick of Truth vai te fazer rir até não aguentar mais. É como mergulhar em um episódio gigantesco da série, com todos os elementos que você ama (ou odeia). Bora dar uma olhada no que achei!

O que eu gostei:

1. É South Park na veia!
Os gráficos são literalmente os mesmos da série, o que faz parecer que você está jogando um episódio interativo. É tudo tão fiel que dá vontade de aplaudir. 👏📺

2. Humor sem freios.
Esse jogo não tem limites — e é isso que o torna tão divertido. Desde as missões mais simples até as situações mais bizarras (alguém falou sobre lutar contra gnomos enquanto está no quarto dos seus pais?), o jogo entrega risadas do começo ao fim. 😂🔥

3. Sistema de combate leve e estratégico.
Apesar de ser um RPG, o combate é super acessível e bem divertido. Você pode usar habilidades absurdas, como peidos poderosos ou armas que só fazem sentido no universo de South Park. 🐲💨

4. Uma paródia dos RPGs clássicos.
O jogo faz piada de absolutamente tudo que amamos nos RPGs — classes, loot, missões secundárias... Nada escapa do humor do Trey Parker e Matt Stone. É perfeito pra quem adora um RPG, mas também consegue rir dos clichês do gênero. 🎲🗡️

O que eu não gostei:

1. É curto demais!
Em cerca de 10-15 horas você já vê tudo que o jogo tem a oferecer. Pra algo tão incrível, queria pelo menos o dobro de conteúdo. Fica aquele gostinho de "quero mais". 😢

2. Humor... às vezes vai longe demais.
Ok, é South Park, então já sabemos que o humor vai ser ofensivo e exagerado, mas algumas piadas podem ultrapassar os limites, até mesmo pra quem ama a série. Prepare-se para momentos desconfortáveis. 😬⚠️

3. Pouca personalização no longo prazo.
No início, escolher sua classe é divertido, mas as opções de personalização e progressão são meio limitadas. Você sente que o RPG é bem simplificado, o que pode decepcionar quem curte mais profundidade. 🛡️

Recomendo?

Com certeza! 😄

Se você é fã de South Park ou gosta de humor ácido e nonsense, esse jogo é um prato cheio. Mesmo que não seja o maior fã de RPGs, o gameplay acessível e a história hilária tornam tudo muito divertido.

Por outro lado, se você é mais sensível a piadas pesadas ou prefere um RPG mais sério e profundo, talvez seja melhor pensar duas vezes antes de embarcar nessa aventura. 💩🔥

ADC recomenda pra quem tem estômago forte e ama dar risada! 😂

184262209.review:
[h1]South Park: The Stick of Truth - Um RPG Hilário e Surpreendentemente Bem-Construído[/h1]

"South Park: The Stick of Truth" é um exemplo único de como adaptar uma série de TV icônica para o universo dos videogames sem perder sua essência. Desenvolvido pela Obsidian Entertainment, em colaboração com Trey Parker e Matt Stone, criadores da série, o jogo entrega uma experiência fiel ao humor, estilo visual e espírito de "South Park", ao mesmo tempo que surpreende ao apresentar mecânicas sólidas de RPG.

Logo de início, o que mais chama a atenção é como o jogo parece um episódio interativo de "South Park". Os gráficos replicam perfeitamente a estética de papel recortado característica da animação, criando a sensação de que o jogador está imerso na própria série. Os cenários, cuidadosamente elaborados, incluem locais icônicos como a escola, a casa de Cartman e até a clínica de aborto — cada um recheado de piadas e referências para os fãs de longa data.

A história coloca o jogador no papel do “Novato”, um novo morador da cidade que se junta a uma guerra de faz-de-conta entre as crianças, divididas entre humanos e elfos, em busca do lendário "Cajado da Verdade". No entanto, como seria esperado de "South Park", a trama rapidamente sai do controle, envolvendo alienígenas, nazistas zumbis e conspirações absurdas, mantendo um humor ácido e irreverente do começo ao fim.

Do ponto de vista da jogabilidade, "The Stick of Truth" é surpreendentemente competente. O combate utiliza um sistema por turnos que mistura ataques básicos, habilidades especiais e uso estratégico de itens. Apesar de ser relativamente simples, a mecânica é enriquecida por ataques interativos, nos quais o jogador precisa apertar botões no momento certo para maximizar o dano ou bloquear ataques inimigos. Isso mantém os combates dinâmicos e evita a monotonia comum em jogos do gênero.

Outro destaque é a customização. O jogador pode criar e personalizar o Novato com uma ampla variedade de roupas, armas e acessórios, muitos dos quais vêm carregados de piadas típicas da série. A escolha de classes (Mago, Guerreiro, Ladrão ou Judeu) adiciona uma camada cômica e estratégica, com habilidades que vão de magias tradicionais a ataques absurdos que só "South Park" poderia conceber.

Apesar de suas muitas qualidades, o jogo não é perfeito. Sua dificuldade é bastante baixa, especialmente para jogadores experientes em RPGs, o que pode reduzir o desafio e a longevidade. Além disso, o humor, por mais fiel que seja à série, pode não agradar a todos, especialmente aqueles que não apreciam sátiras pesadas ou temas controversos.

Por outro lado, para os fãs de "South Park", esses mesmos elementos são exatamente o que tornam o jogo especial. Ele captura perfeitamente o espírito da série, ao mesmo tempo em que oferece uma experiência de jogo genuinamente divertida e bem construída. A atenção aos detalhes, como diálogos hilários e missões paralelas memoráveis, eleva "The Stick of Truth" além de uma simples adaptação.

not to mention the price! you've gotta get it before the deal runs out! this is a crazy low price! so even if you regret the purchase, which i don't think you will, you'll only have spent a few bucks! 

if you're sure you'll enjoy it, then get that bundle too! i got it because i know damn well i'll be playing the fractured but whole after i finish this one. any big fan of south park, no matter how capable or terrible of a gamer they are, will surely enjoy this game and its sequel.

Me gusta que no sea como el típico RPG donde tenes que medir si o si el daño, que consecuencias pueden a ver y lo que putas fuere, ademas de que es bueno poder interactuar para que un ataque pueda salir bien, si sos alguien inquieto (incluyéndome) prácticamente te viene de 10 para quitar esa necesidad de tener que si o si apretar un boton aunque sea, vale la pena, es barato cuando lo ponen en oferta, si te queres pasar al 100% un juego entretenido que no cueste mucho y tenes el tiempo libre suficiente como para no ir a laburar o ir a la facultad y poder hacer cualquier cosa con tal de que tus receptores de dopamina estén siempre activos, este juego es uno de los indicados.

184155288.review:
Awesomeness in perfection made for Southpark fans. An extra long playable Southpark episode!

[table][tr][td]
Overall      ★★★★★★★★★☆ - 9/10
Music        ★★★★★★☆☆☆☆ - 6/10
Graphics   ★★★★★★★★★☆ - 9/10
Gameplay ★★★★★★★★★★ - 10/10
Story         ★★★★★★★★★☆ - 9/10
[/td][/tr][/table]

Difficulty ★★★☆☆☆☆☆☆☆ (judged on even hardest difficulty)

[b]What did I like?[/b]

* the whole Southpark style was copied very good
* Southpark humour but even more ribald (be warned in a positive way)
* graphics still work out on 4K as well even being 10 years old
* RPG system has interesting action elements (QTE and timing based)
* lots of references to the TV series are spreaded throughout the town
* freeplay after final battle
* lots of visuals and customizables

[b]What did I not like?[/b]

* difficulty on hardcore was even too easy
* no NG+
* censored version (but it's still ok)
* game does remind me of the many flash game RPGs on Newgrounds.com, but more professional

[b]Summary:[/b]

As a Southpark fan that watched all seasons this game totally cracked me up. So much crazy and lovely details, a wicked but yet funny story and the whole town to explore and just meet every important character of the series was so gorgeous.If you consider yourself a fan, this is a must play even in 2024, there is nothing more to be said about. Go get it - now :)

South Park: The Stick of Truth é conhecido pela sua irreverência e humor característico da série. Durante o jogo, podes esperar uma grande dose de sátira, piadas provocadoras e momentos inesperados que desafiam os limites do convencional. Um dos elementos mais marcantes é a possibilidade de usar armas inusitadas, incluindo um órgão sexual masculino de borracha, para enfrentar os teus inimigos e causar o caos no típico estilo de South Park.

Além disso, o jogo permite explorar um mundo cheio de referências à série, interagir com personagens icônicos e participar em batalhas hilárias, tornando cada momento uma combinação perfeita de diversão e absurdo. É uma aventura que desafia qualquer noção de seriedade e celebra o humor irreverente como poucos outros jogos conseguem.

184026358.review:
Je ne suis qu'a 8h00 de jeu donc pas du tout fini la campagne, mais franchement on y retrouve toute la séries des rappel à la pelle.
Peux importe la saison sur des personnages secondaire ou non, des objets et tout. Tous les personnage sont travaillé les texte sympa, je sur-pousse certaines répétitions de texte pour voir certains qui sont écrit en plusieurs choix.
Bref c'est génial.
Pour moi le grand truc qui me décolle de l'immersion assez souvent c'est la VO. C'est vrai quoi, déjà par le manque cruelle d'un manque que l'on aime vraiment les voix VF, mais en plus les personnages en sous-titre Fr parle trop vitre et on loupe les cinématique.
Ils auraient dt mettre un mode ou le texte stop l'action vidéo tant que l'on appuis par sur un bouton suite, car moi qui aime regarder 100% une scène je loupe sans arrête pour pouvoir lire, et comme cela va souvent trop vite je chois de lire au lieu de regarder les scènes.

Quelqu'un qui aime la série devrait aimer le jeu car franchement c'est la même chose en plus on voyage dans la ville du lors c'est un autre angle qui fait plaisir afin de reconnaître le tout.

J'aurai bien noté un 17-18 sur 20, mais il faudra enlever 3 points à cause de la non trad VF, c'est chiant et c'était tellement important pour les fans.

[h1] Never fart to balls [/h1]

Oynadığım en eğlenceli ve en mizah dolu oyunlardan biri. Oyunun her anında eğlendim ve sıkıldığım tek bir an bile olmadı.

Hikaye oldukça keyifli, diyaloglar hoş. Karakterlerin kendine has esprileri ile oyunun hikayesel ilerleyişine gerçekten bayıldım. Uzun zamandır bir oyunun beni bu kadar güldürdüğünü de hatırlamıyorum.

South park'ın küçük kasabasında geçen fakat haritanın kısıtlı olmasına rağmen yeteri kadar detaylı bence. Ayrıca haritayı keşfederken gizli lootlar ve yan detaylarla karşılaşmak da hoş. Görevler, genel olarak birbirlerine biraz benzer fakat olabildiği kadar monotonluktan çıkarmaya çalışmışlar. 

Sıra tabanlı savaş mekanikleri eğlenceli ve esprili bir şekilde işlenmiş. Karakter geliştirme sistemi başarılı, silah ve zırh çeşitliliği yeterli düzeyde. Oyunda her seviyede yeni bir item deneyebiliyorsunuz.

Oyunun süresi ise tam kıvamında. Ne çok uzun ne de kısa, oyunun sonu geldiğinde tam anlamıyla tatmin olmuş oluyorsunuz. Uzun süredir bir oyundan bu kadar memnun bir şekilde ayrıldığımı hatırlamıyorum. GOAT Obsidian’a teşekkürler.

183960222.review:
Целевая аудитория The Stick of Truth - фанаты сериала и только они. Остальные вряд ли оценят ту извращенную логику, которая пронизывает всю игру так же, как и мультфильм, а мотивы главных героев не поймут те, кто не знаком с четырьмя самыми проблемными учениками Южного Парка. Лучше посмотрите хотя бы пару серий - заодно узнаете, является ли ваше основное произведение произведением современного искусства, где в порядке вещей использовать в бою с врагом напыщенность, а сценаристы готовы нарушить любые табу ради хорошего смеха.

Но для тех, кто уже стал поклонником «Южного парка", "Палка истины" - настоящий праздник, который нельзя пропустить ни в коем случае.

Плюсы: то же, что и у сериала - непредсказуемый сюжет и ни с чем не сравнимый юмор; отличная музыка и озвучка.
Минусы: трудно воспринимать The Stick of Truth как игру - игровой процесс принесен в жертву сюжету.

183925369.review:
Esse jogo eu tenho um carinho grande, tive o primeiro contato com ele no 360 do meu primo, nessa epoca eu consegui jogar somente ate a parte dos gnomos no quarto dos pais então farei uma analise adequada.

Pontos Positivos:
-Gamaplay: como um RPG por turno ele funciona extremamente bem, com uma dinamica divertida e que não enjoa, a quantidade de variações de builds de equipamento, modificadores, habilidades, vantagens, classes e companheiros da uma liberdade boa, Alem disso no lado de exploração funciona bem para engajar a sair procurando cantos, buracos ou qualquer coisa secreta para coletar qualquer coisa que seja.
-Historia: Me faz sentir como se eu tivesse assistindo um filme de south park, a historia é escrita da mesma forma que um episodio, tem seu ponto forte que vale muito a pena, as partes sem sentido pode ser negativo mas para meu humor encaixa bem.
-Coletaveis: Eu nunca fui de platinar jogos, mas por conta dos coletaveis desse jogo serem bem feitos, chamativos e com um efeito sono que engaja a tentar achar mais, me fez ter vontade de platinar, estou quase fazendo isso.

Pontos negativos

-Datado: Um problema de South park em qualquer midia, como a produção utiliza referencias que estão em alta na semana ou no mês (e normalmente apenas norte america) simplesmente as piadas ou criticas perdem o efeito e so fica algo jogado e ninxado... o que para muitos é chato
-Crach: O jogo pode crachar do nada sem muita explicação, então é bom salvar de forma recorente
-Bug visual: Não sei se é algo recorente, mas em varias cutscene o personagem jogavel fica piscando e outros personagens simplesmente desaparecem... Isso aconteceu ate na cena da batalha final... foi anticlimatico mas pelo menos ficou engraçado ter apenas o vilão na cena olhando para o nada.
-Conquistas peerdiveis:  Cuidado se pretende platinar, de uma lida em guias antes se pretende fazer na primeira run, por que tem muita coisa que é no começo que é bem facil de perder, para platinar tem de jogar pelo menos duas vezes pq tem algumas (poucas mas tem) conquistas que se divergem mas a segunda run não precisa ser ate o final se a primeira for feita de forma planejada

183922720.review:
Sin palabras, este juego fue de lo mejor que pude haber probado en Steam, soy fan acérrimo de la serie y este juego se sintió como si estuviera dentro de un episodio de esta, pude entender todas las referencias que salieron y me encantó que los audios estuvieran en su lengua original porque hacer la experiencia más auténtica.
A diferencia de otros juegos de caricaturas tales como los Simpsons (hit and run) Bob Esponja (bikini bottom) las tortugas Ninja (bitmaps de arcade), etc; La vara de la verdad mantiene el estilo visual de la serie, con todas sus simplesas e imperfecciones que hacen ver al show mal hecho a propósito y que también son único en su tipo; además de todo eso, cuenta con el humor irreberente y tan negro que lo caracteriza, acompañada de esa escritura que a simple vista parece estúpida, pero que al analizarla a fondo ni en mil años uno podrá logras ese nivel de complejidad en la sátira que lograron crear Trey Parker y Matt Stone en el mejor momento del show y se podría decir q hasta ahora.
Y como el juego no podía ser más South Park, la jugabilidad es una burla a los tropos genéricos de muchos juegos RPG como son el protagonista silencioso, la historia de un elegido que resultas ser tú, misiones que solo te recompensan con cumplirlas sin recibir nada bueno a cambio y muchas cosas más que apesar de que todos estos cliches estén presentes en el juego lo supieron ejecutar tan bien que irónicamente el juego se combierte en lo mejor que ofrece su género sin que te aburras en ningún minuto.
Ya acabando esto que se pone muy largo, soy una persona que se le podría decir que es "ahorradora" y procura no gastar ni una moneda al momento de descargar videojuegos, pero esta serie significa mucho para mi por lo que esta es de esos pocos juegos que los tengo comprados y les puedo asegurar que cada sol que gasté (moneda Peruano) valió la pena.

183846134.review:
As a long time South Park fans I played this game when it came out 10 years ago on xbox 360, and finally grabbed this on sale for only 4 dollars. Finished the play through as Fighter (My first playthrough 10 yeras ago was thief) today and it's even better than what I remembered when I first played it. [b] ABSOLUTELY [/b]incredible game. 

[u] Pros: [/u]
-[b] PERFECTLY [/b]replicated the spirit of "South Park" into the game. The humour, the voice acting, the art style, the references from the show etc. Completely flawless.
-Amazing gameplay. The combat system is fun and surprisingly strategic. The game gives you alot of options to customize your build, and your abilities and buddies are all unique and fun to test around. 
-The OST, who can expect the music of a South Park game has THIS much epicness??
-The length of the main story is perfect, not too short not too long, just the right amount of content to make it enjoyable. 

[u] Cons (The game is pretty much flawless, but here are some minor things that might bother some people): [/u]
-Sometimes your save will conflict with the automated check-points in the game. Occasionally your manually-saved save file might get overwritten by auto checkpoints, so sometimes when you continue the game you might lose few seconds of your progress. 
-Sometimes combat music gets muted for some reason. And I had to shut-down and restart the game to make it work again. Not a big deal though.
-If you are a completionist then you need to be EXTREMELY careful of all time to make sure all the collectables aren't missed. Some collectables can only be obtained during specific missions and if you accidentally missed it you will NEVER be able to get it back this playthrough. (I missed a chinpokomon during the school mission and it was the only one I missed, and this caused me to unable to complete at least 2 achievements because of it.) But if you do not care about getting all the achievements then its no issue.

Overrall, still an amazing game! Had a blast playing it again after 10 years! Will probably start a new run soon as the Wizard. Would recommend it to all South Park fans!

If the game wasnt so expensive, I wouldnt give it a negative review (I wouldnt give a positive one either). 

Maybe because I dont find South Parks sense of humor much funny (there are good jokes here and there, but most just dont hit it for me. Humor is subjective, no matter how horrible, gross, bigoted and whatever else), I didnt enjoy the game. It wasnt bad, it wasnt good either though and especially for 30 euros. I got it on a very big discount, but I wish I could return it, but too late now. 

The game is also short, very short if you dont just run around like me. 

The best aspect of this game was combat.

For some reason, has max level and you cant get every upgrade or ability. Will never understand "balancing" in single player games. I have talked about this so many times, I dont want to go into another rant, so I will end this at that.

The game is "meh". I got it for like 8 euros (with dlcs, which were dookie)? Still didnt enjoy. I wish I could return it. I also bought the other one with the bundle, now regretting it.

Tried to do all the achievements, until I realized I missed one collectible out 30 on some one time event place. Worst part, it is connected to another achievement, that requires you to complete every sidequest and search through every nook and creek again (I already did that, I am not doing that again). Fuck no. Shit achievements.

Lo pille en las rebajas de otoño y ¿qué decir? La Vara de la Verdad es un hermoso juego, una carta de a los fans de South Park y su primer juego.

El apartado visual es, pues, el estilo de South Park que es muy característico. Su historia es la cosa más surrealista que he visto, nada se conecta con nada y eso es bueno ya que sigue la lógica de capítulos de South Park normales. Es una locura que hayan sacado a la luz este juego con temas tan polémicos y no lo hayan cancelado. Lo único medianamente malo que le veo al juego son sus EXCESIVOS logros perdibles y la innecesaria mecánica de tener que cambiarte de traje en zonas específicas o llevar tal traje debido a que tiene atributos potentes, para mi que eso es malo y deberían dejar que las personas se pongan el traje que quieran.

Tras todo esto, el juego es un sólido 8 o 9 ya que después de todo NO es perfecto. Comprároslo, no os arrepentiréis y es un hecho que Cartman es uno de los personajes más fuertes del juego aún con su poca vida.

183781981.review:
I can't remember the last time I laughed in a game this hard. I usually don't play RPG or turn based combat at all now(played too many as a kid) but I made an exception for this. Of course there are a lot of dumb jokes but there are some pretty decent jokes too. It's not always in your face with jokes which I like. There is still combat and levelling up. The more I played this game, the more it made me wonder what I expect another game like Elden Ring to be like.

I haven't played Elden Ring yet but I really want it to be like this. Like this, I mean where you get to chose your type of character, types of upgrades and types of play-style even if they don't make much sense. They should be fun. Everything in this in terms of combat is fun. There was never a time when I actually wanted to stop playing this game. There is decent enough story and pretty good narrative and side-quests going along.

Must play for a South Park fan or even if you're looking to get into South Park altogether. I just put combat on easy because I was more focussed on the story and you don't have to encounter every baddy that you come across. You can just run and avoid them if you don't want to do it.

O humor duvidoso e que muitos podem considerar como desnecessário e pesado é uma das várias belezas que transformam esse jogo uma obra de arte que capta bem a essência de anos de exibição. Lotado de referências, o jogo pode trazer nostalgia para qualquer um que assistiu a série animada em qualquer fase da vida e para quem nunca assistiu é uma porta de entrada para todo um universo confinado em uma pequena cidade. 

A criação de personagem simples, mas que te acolhe dentro do estilo único que o jogo proporciona, uma exploração dinâmica que tem sucesso em não ser maçante, diálogos engraçados em todos os momentos do jogo e uma história interessante que faz você desejar por mais. Esse tipo de jogo não é algo que pode ser julgado propriamente com palavras, mas sim com a jogatina e experiência que cada indivíduo tem. A melhor fórmula do sucesso é simplesmente ser fiel e por amor naquilo que você produz e Stick Of Truth ta aqui para provar.

O jogo é incrível e extremamente divertido, com uma história que, por mais incrível que pareça, ainda é engraçada mesmo tendo passado alguns anos. Amo o nível de piadas do South Park e como ele pode evoluir de crianças brincando para a coisa mais absurda do mundo. Isso é incrível demais! kkkkkkjh

[b]Uma outra coisa foda deste jogo em específico é que não precisa da UbiPLAY para jogar, apenas o Steam ta tudo certo![/b]

Porém, acabei descobrindo vários bugs que podem ocorrer. Alguns eu sei o motivo, outros parecem ser aleatórios. Mas, para mim, o pior bug que pode ocorrer é o jogo [b]simplesmente travar ao entrar em uma tela de carregamento[/b], o que pode fazer você voltar muito ou só um pouco atrás.

[h1] Platinar [/h1]
Platinar este jogo foi uma delícia de qualquer forma, mas já aviso para tomarem cuidado se forem platinar, pois há [b]muita coisa que é perdível[/b] e você pode ter que refazer tudo de novo.

183627401.review: Esse jogo é uma experiência única e memorável, perfeita para qualquer fã do seriado. Joguei pela primeira vez em 2016, e até hoje considero um dos melhores jogos adaptados de uma série. Foi meu primeiro contato com jogos de turno, e o fato de controlar personagens tão queridos tornou tudo mais acessível e incrivelmente divertido. A seleção de aliados, apesar de pequena, é rica e cheia de possibilidades. Cada personagem traz habilidades únicas que mudam completamente a forma como você precisa jogar, seja adaptando táticas ou escolhendo itens que complementem seu estilo de jogo. Essa variedade torna cada batalha interessante e estratégica, sem perder o humor característico da série. O tom de crítica social é mais suave do que no seriado, mas isso parece intencional, já que o foco aqui é a comédia e a diversão. A parte do Canadá é um destaque à parte. Para mim, foi uma referência clara a Final Fantasy 1, com o estilo retrô e o mapa simplificado, o que trouxe uma nostalgia inesperada. As 20 horas que passei jogando passaram voando. Tudo no jogo funciona perfeitamente: o humor, as mecânicas e o ritmo da história. Se o jogo tivesse mais 40 horas, seria um prazer explorá-las. Além disso, a platina é bem tranquila, com o foco principal na história e um fator replay que torna a busca pelos troféus algo prazeroso e nada cansativo. Um jogo que, para mim, permanece impecável até hoje.

183608225.review:
Totalement disjoncté!

La série vous semble déjà "hardcore" avec les sujets, la vulgarité et l'absurdité qui ont fait le succès? ET bien ici, c'est la même chose à un niveau 10 fois supérieur. Aucune censure (ou très très peu) et l'ensemble des personnages y sont, de manière active ou passive. Trouver par exemple Mr Toc (Mr Hat), Mr Esclave (Mr Slave), Chef ([spoiler]en Zombie[/spoiler]), l'ensemble des camarades à l'école, les Gothiques, ceux de la classe de sixième, Jésus, les Aliens, Al Gore, David Hasselhof, Mr Hankey, et encore plusieurs autres .... avec pleins de références aux épisodes passé, tel que le "pilote" avec les Aliens, la phase Dophin du père de Kyle, le [spoiler]nazisme[/spoiler], Al Gore et l'homoursporc, et plein d'autres à découvrir.

Ce jeu est un immense épisode, conçu comme la série, le gameplay est fantastique et out semble participer à une émission interactive. Les mêmes schéma scénaristique sont utilisés et les histoires, principales ou facultative, digne des saisons. 

Conçu en RPG, vous devez acquérir des capacités, des armes et des habits aidant dans votre quête. Moi qui n'aime pas ce genre de jeu, dans l'univers de South Park, tout s'y intègre très bien. Chaque items à une logique propre à la série, et qui marche parfaitement avec la mécanique de ce genre de jeu.

Sans la censure traditionnel de la télévision, le jeu permet d'aller plus loin, voir trop, j'ai particulièrement été dégoûté par l'usage [spoiler]de l'avortement, et surtout les fœtus zombie nazis[/spoiler], mais ça respecte en tout point l'esprit de la série.

Il y a un passage au Canada, et je dois avouer que je n'ai jamais aimé comment le Canada est vu par la série, étant moi-même Canadien, québécois, la série apporte une vision totalement erroné de la structure démocratique du pays. Je laisse passer, me disant que c'est une modification plus ou moins volontaire pour justifier des lignes scénaristique (dans le jeu comme la série). [spoiler]Comme le "ministre de Montréal" qui devrais être le "Ministre du Québec", qui serais déjà plus juste au niveau des rôles et des conflits dans la politique Canadienne, étant vrai que le Québec fait souvent office de mouton noir dans les négociations avec le fédéral, qui est la gouvernance principale du Canada. Le Canada n'est pas un monarchie, mais un pays indépendant propriété de l'Angleterre, en simple.[/spoiler]

Mais le changement de gameplay dans le Canada fait partis des liens que vous trouverez ici et là aux anciens RPG. Des références aux opus de Zelda, FInal Fantasy et d'autres prouve que l'équipe derrière ce jeu a étudié le domaine avant de ce lancer, pour créer de quoi qui tiendra la route, et permettra d'avoir une implantation total de la série dans jeu, sans devoir créer de quoi de nouveau.

Achetez ce jeu avec l'esprit tranquille, la qualité respecte le prix, malgré quelques erreurs de "Guidage" et de "Traduction", mais ont n'est pas dans une traduction approximatif, c'est que dans la partie de [spoiler]l'avortement, à la troisième phase d'actions, il est mal expliqué qu'il faut faire clique gauche, tiens, clique droit, et APRÈS, clique droit, tiens, clique gauche et ce en alternance. Ce qui fait que cette scène horrible ma été répété plusieurs fois avant que je trouve la solution sur dans un guide, c'était simple a exécuter mais compliquer à savoir[/spoiler].

C'est un doublage en V.O. comme dans la série. Avec sous-titre complet en français.
